intro: Descurainia andrenarum, commonly known as the yellow rocket, is a flowering plant native to North America. It belongs to the family Brassicaceae, which includes many other plants with similar floral structures. The plant produces small, yellow flowers that are arranged in racemes, and it has pinnately divided leaves. It is often found in disturbed soils and can thrive in a variety of habitats, including roadsides and fields. The species is known for its rapid growth and ability to colonize open areas.
